Package Interfaces

Interface Alerts

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddAppointment, Customer, Customers, LandingPage, LoginScreen, UpdateAppointment, Users
public interface Alerts
Provides a general alert functionality to implementing classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String alertTitle, String alertContent)
    Generates an alert of any AlertType and displays it with a custom title, header, and content/body, and finally shows the alert.

  • Method Details

    • showAlert

      default void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String alertTitle, String alertContent)
      Generates an alert of any AlertType and displays it with a custom title, header, and content/body, and finally shows the alert.
